DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether omega-3 fatty acid supplementation effective improvement suboptimal health status cardiovascular risk .
DOC.detailed_description: The Suboptimal health status questionnaire ( SHSQ-25 ) use evaluate suboptimal health status . The SHSQ-25 include 25 question . The score SHSQ-25 0 100 . Suboptimal health status define SHSQ-25 score 35 . The high score SHSQ-25 one get , severity suboptimal health status he/she . All participant ask fill SHSQ-25 intervention . If score decrease intervention , mean suboptimal health status improve .
DOC.criteria: 1. suboptimal health status , define score suboptimal health questionnaire ≥35 . 2. least one cardiovascular risk factor : overweight obesity , define body mass index ( BMI ) ≥25 kg/m2 . systolic blood pressure ≥130 < 140 mmHg diastolic blood pressure < 90 mmHg , diastolic blood pressure ≥85 < 90 mmHg systolic blood pressure < 140 mmHg fast plasma glucose ≥100 < 126 mg/dL total cholesterol ≥200 < 240 mg/dL , triglyceride ≥150 < 200 mg/dL , low density lipoproteincholesterol ≥130 < 160 mg/dL , and/or high density lipoproteincholesterol < 40 mg/dL 3. write informed consent 1. history system diseases , cardiovascular disease , digestive system disease , diseases respiratory system , blood immune system diseases , nervous system disease , endocrine system diseases , diseases genitourinary system . 2. history mental illness . 3. pregnant breastfeeding . 4. use antihypertensive , antidiabetic , lipidlowering drug within past two week . 5. use fish oil capsule supplement contain omega3 fatty acid within past two week . 6. allergy intolerance fish oil , corn oil , omega3 fatty acid , vitamin E. 7. participation another trial . 8. unable promise use drug fish oil study . 9. unable provide inform write consent .
